DataElement.preferredName: Myeloproliferative Neoplasm Symptom Assessment Form Past Week Overall Quality of Life Score 11 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated perception of their overall quality of life during the past week, using an 11 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Myeloproliferative Neoplasm Symptom Assessment Form Past Week Overall Quality of Life Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire for monitoring the most debilitating symptoms experienced by patients with myeloproliferative neoplasms._The most recent week, including today._Including everything._The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire for monitoring the most debilitating symptoms experienced by patients with myeloproliferative neoplasms.

Concepts.definition: A self-administered questionnaire for monitoring the most debilitating symptoms experienced by patients with myeloproliferative neoplasms.

Property.preferredName: Past Week Overall Quality of Life Score
Property.preferredDefinition: The most recent week, including today.:Including everything.:The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life.  The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.
Including everything.

The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: MPN-SAF: Myeloproliferative Neoplasm Symptom Assessment Form, Scherber R, et.al.,  2011
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for OHSU study in Rave per request by L.Bradley. mc 9/29/14

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Quality; a degree or grade of excellence or worth; an essential and distinguishing attribute of something or someone._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::11_The precise location of something; a spatially limited location._The act of ascertaining or fixing the value or worth of something._an ordered reference standard.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: As Good As It Can Be

ValueMeaning.preferredName: As Good As It Can Be
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating the something is as good as can be expected or imagined.

Concepts.longName: As Good As It Can Be
Concepts.definition: A response indicating the something is as good as can be expected or imagined.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: As Good As It Can Be To As Bad As It Can Be Likert Score 1

ValueMeaning.preferredName: As Good As It Can Be To As Bad As It Can Be Likert Score 1
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating the something is as good as can be expected or imagined.: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.: A response indicating the something is as bad as can be expected or imagined.: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::11: The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.: A subjective score of 1 on a Likert scale.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Quality Score Integer::11 Point Rating Scale
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An essential and distinguishing attribute of something or someone; a degree or grade of excellence or worth.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::11:The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.:The act of ascertaining or fixing the value or worth of something.:an ordered reference standard.

Concepts.definition: An essential and distinguishing attribute of something or someone; a degree or grade of excellence or worth.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.
The act of ascertaining or fixing the value or worth of something.
An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
